thread.title: Elderly brothers robbed, killed in Limpopo
thread.title_full: Elderly brothers robbed, killed in Limpopo | News24

author: news24.com
title: Elderly brothers robbed, killed in Limpopo
text:
Polokwane - Six men have been arrested for allegedly killing and robbing two elderly brothers in Glenfenis village, in the Capricorn district in Limpopo, provincial police said on Monday.
It was believed six armed men entered a general dealer around 21:30 on Thursday night then shot and killed George and Joseph Lebogo, both in their 70s, police said in a statement.
A third person was shot in the leg and taken to hospital.
"The suspects took a Toyota Hilux and fled from the scene. The vehicle was later found abandoned in the village. A manhunt was launched for the suspects and the first four were arrested on Friday morning," police said.
